jobs.title: Freelance Writer
jobs.description:
ARE YOU SOUTH ASIAN AND LIVING IN BRITAIN?
• We are looking for individuals who identify as South Asian, who are currently living in the UK. We want to hear about your experiences of living in and growing up in Britain
• We are looking for 1st, 2nd and 3rd generation South Asians to reflect upon their ex- periences of being an ethnic minority within Britain
• We are interested to hear both positive and difficult stories from men, women, pro- fessionals and non-professionals
• If you are interested in finding out more information, please get in touch: bsastories@gmail.com
